title: Jobs for the girls
creator_credit: Suzanne Davies and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: This film illustrates the ways in which young girls are influenced when choosing a job or career. A young woman careers officer describes the factors which affect firls’ attitudes at every level - school, college, and work, and sequences illustrate her statements.
description: This film illustrates the ways in which young girls are influenced when choosing a job or career. A young woman careers officer describes the factors which affect firls’ attitudes at every level - school, college, and work, and sequences illustrate her statements.
